WorkItem.Description: It would be nice to have an option which controls whether the output is written to a single file (which already exists) or to stdout stream.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature request: Write output to stdout

Comments.Message:
For those who want to digg into the source, I've already created a little list of files which have to be changed:
http://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/397941#post921960

Just an FYI that this can be easily done using the standard redirect operators > and >>.

c:\> tsc code.ts > output.log

I am having troube reading the stdout Output into my Notepad++ (using NppExec). Only the first line of output is received. I have been around in Node.js and NppExec Forums to discuss that but it seems to be an issue of the TypeScript Nodejs module. Can u have a look at this:
